item.description:
The Town has gotten some great reviews from professionals and, more importantly, from FMM members! I just ran into Pete last night at Best Buy and he said he loved it, too.

So let's join the bandwagon and head to a film shot and based in Boston with one of our own starring and directing, Ben Affleck.

We'll meet at 6:45 inside the ticket lobby, as the movie starts at 7:15. Then we'll head to Unos (or wherever we decide) after the flick to chat and munch.

SUMMARY:
Doug MacRay is an unrepentant criminal, the de facto leader of a group of ruthless bank robbers who pride themselves in stealing what they want and getting out clean. With no real attachments, Doug never has to fear losing anyone close to him. But that all changed on the gang's latest job, when they briefly took a hostage--bank manager, Claire Keesey. Though they let her go unharmed, Claire is nervously aware that the robbers know her name and where she lives. But she lets her guard down when she meets an unassuming and rather charming man named Doug not realizing that he is the same man who only days earlier had terrorized her. The instant attraction between them gradually turns into a passionate romance that threatens to take them both down a dangerous, and potentially deadly, path.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet right inside the theater ticket lobby doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

Hope to see you for The Towne!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: The Town
